Author: TheVoiceInZanesHead

Comment: I bet the Chinese diplomats are giddy with excitement. They’re about to position China to dominate for the next decade plus.  MAGA can spin this all they want China knows what they’re doing and Trump does not.  Every outcome here is a huge win for China. Even the worst outcome of high tariffs for US imports is a long term win for them. Yes there would be a recession (or worse) but who is hurt more there? I’d say we are.  The best case here is a deal is struck to eliminate tariffs and sure we all get something here but China then gets the most benefit. Then all they have to do is keep chipping away at our global dominance.  To me this whole trade war is an overall loser for us. Yea sure we can maybe get some manufacturing here (we likely won’t) but it has cost us our global footing. If that was the goal then Trump has done a fantastic job.
